channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Golf Rangefinders (2025)
item.description: Unlock the course and raise your game with the best golf rangefinders you can buy.

item.title: 35 Best Family Board Games (2025): Catan, Ticket to Ride, Codenames
item.description: From monsters to kittens to strategy games, these sets will liven things up on nights when everyone is tired of screens.

item.title: AI researchers ’embodied’ an LLM into a robot – and it started channeling Robin Williams
item.description: AI researchers at Andon Labs embedded various LLMs in a vacuum robot to test how ready they were to be embodied. And hilarity ensued.

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about AOL’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: Rising energy prices put AI and data centers in the crosshairs
item.description: A majority of consumers say they’re worried about data centers driving up electricity costs. Is the industry prepared for a possible backlash?

item.title: Elon Musk wants you to know that Sam Altman got a refund for his Tesla Roadster
item.description: Elon Musk and Sam Altman are still taking swipes at each other on Musk’s social media platform X.

item.title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong trolls the prediction markets
item.description: While Armstrong may have helped some Kalshi and Polymarket users make a little money, he was also illustrating how easily these markets can be manipul...

item.title: 9 Best Rain Jackets (2025): Cheap, Eco-Friendly, Hiking, and Running
item.description: When it rains, it pours. Here are our picks for cold, wet days—plus expert tips on deciphering product specs.

item.title: Man Jailed Over Trump Meme After Charlie Kirk's Shooting Has Finally Been Released
item.description: Larry Bushart was charged with threatening a school after reposting a Facebook meme about Trump. A Tennessee sheriff, who mourned Kirk online, demande...

item.title: Climate Change Made Hurricane Melissa 4 Times More Likely, Study Suggests
item.description: Unusually warm ocean temperatures fueled one of the worst hurricanes on record. New research finds climate change increased the storm’s likelihood.
